careerBackground: My background is management consultancy - specialising in helping the CIO with key initiatives from undertaking IT strategies through to large scale change transformations. My specialism focuses on the people side of change - working with the Leadership team to define the organisation structure, overseeing recruitment campaigns through to developing the necessary training curriculums and career pathways.
role: My role at ANDigital is the Activation Lead helping to make sure our service meet our clients' needs - getting our squads prepared to hit the ground running with the necessary induction materials, tailoring our training catalogue for the client and managing clients' requests.  I’m here to help our squads do what they do best by removing all surrounding challenges so  our clients quickly see the true value and difference we bring.
superHeroPower: My super hero power would be to heal others (particularly children) - to help make them well, feel loved and be happy.
